blocks.name: cfrecs
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for the founded recursion generator. See ~ df-frecs .
blocks.origin: prop class cfrecs(class c0, class c1, class c2) { frecs(c0, c1, c2) }

blocks.name: diff.cfrecs.s
diff.cfrecs.c
diff.cfrecs.w
df-frecs
blocks.content: This is the definition for the founded recursion generator. Similar to ~ df-wrecs and ~ df-recs , it is a direct definition form of normally recursive relationships. Unlike the former two definitions, it only requires a founded set-like relationship for its properties, not a well-founded relationship. However, the proof of this requires the Axiom of Infinity, so we retain the other definitions since their properties do not require it. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-frecs(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfrecs(c0, c1, c2), cuni(cab(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wral(s2, cv(s1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))), wral(s2, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c2, cres(cv(s0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-frecs(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ frecs(c0, c1, c2)= ⋃ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0[Fn]s1 ∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2)⊆ s1))∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s1,(s0 ` s2)=(s2[c2](s0 |` Pred(c0, c1, s2))))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
}

blocks.name: frecseq123
blocks.content: Equality theorem for founded recursion generator. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Dec-2021.)

thm frecseq123(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), wceq(cfrecs(c0, c2, c4), cfrecs(c1, c3, c5)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfrecs(c0, c2, c4), cfrecs(c1, c3, c5), cuni(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)))))))))), cuni(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)))))))))), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  unieqd(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2))))))))), cab(hs0, wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2))))))))), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  abbidv(hs0, w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)))))))), wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)))))))))
  exbidv(hs1, w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2))))))), w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2))))))))
  3anbi23d(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)))))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)))))))
  anbi12d(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), wss(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1))), wss(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1))))
  sseq2d(cv(hs1), c2, c3, w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  simp2(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5))
  ralbidv(hs2, cv(hs1), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), wss(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)), wss(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))
  sseq1d(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  ralbidv(hs2, cv(hs1), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2))))))
  eqeq2d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)))), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)))), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)))), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)))), co(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)))), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  oveqd(cv(hs2), c4, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2))), c5, w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  simp3(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5))
  oveq2d(cv(hs2), c5, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2))), cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2))), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  reseq2d(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2)), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  3adant3(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2))))
  mp3an3(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs2)), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))
  equid(hs2)
  predeq123(c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs2), cv(hs2))
  df-frecs(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c2, c4)
  df-frecs(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c3, c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  diff.hs2.w(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs2.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm frecseq123(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5)→ frecs(c0, c2, c4)= frecs(c1, c3, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(frecs(c0, c2, c4), frecs(c1, c3, c5), ⋃ { hs0 | ∃(hs1,(hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2))))))}, ⋃ { hs0 | ∃(hs1,(hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2))))))}, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  unieqd({ hs0 | ∃(hs1,(hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2))))))}, { hs0 | ∃(hs1,(hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2))))))}, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  abbidv(hs0, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5), ∃(hs1,(hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2)))))), ∃(hs1,(hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2)))))))
  exbidv(hs1, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5), (hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2))))), (hs0[Fn]hs1 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2)⊆ hs1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2))))))
  3anbi23d((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5), hs0[Fn]hs1, (hs1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)⊆ hs1)), ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2)))), (hs1 ⊆ c3 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2)⊆ hs1)), ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2)))))
  anbi12d((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5), hs1 ⊆ c2, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)⊆ hs1), hs1 ⊆ c3, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2)⊆ hs1))
  sseq2d(hs1, c2, c3, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  simp2(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, c4 = c5)
  ralbidv(hs2, hs1, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5), Pred(c0, c2, hs2)⊆ hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2)⊆ hs1)
  sseq1d(Pred(c0, c2, hs2), hs1, Pred(c1, c3, hs2), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  ralbidv(hs2, hs1, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5), (hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2))), (hs0 ` hs2)=(hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2))))
  eqeq2d((hs0 ` hs2), (hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2))), (hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2))), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  eqtrd((hs2[c4](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2))), (hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2))), (hs2[c5](hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2))), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  oveqd(hs2, c4, (hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2)), c5, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  simp3(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, c4 = c5)
  oveq2d(hs2, c5, (hs0 |` Pred(c0, c2, hs2)), (hs0 |` Pred(c1, c3, hs2)), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  reseq2d(hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs2), Pred(c1, c3, hs2), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  3adant3(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, c4 = c5, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)= Pred(c1, c3, hs2))
  mp3an3(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, Pred(c0, c2, hs2)= Pred(c1, c3, hs2), hs2 = hs2)
  equid(hs2)
  predeq123(c0, c1, c2, c3, hs2, hs2)
  df-frecs(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c2, c4)
  df-frecs(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c3, c5)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  diff.hs2.w((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs2.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: nffrecs
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the founded recursion generator. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nffrecs(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cfrecs(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cfrecs(c0, c1, c2), cuni(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))))))))))
  df-frecs(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2)
  nfuni(s0, cab(hs0, wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2))))))))))
  nfab(s0, hs0, wex(hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))))))))
  nfex(s0, hs1, w3a(wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2))))))))
  nf3an(s0, wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  nfv(s0, wfn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  nfan(s0, wss(cv(hs1), c1), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1))))
  nfss(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  nfral(s0, hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))
  nfss(s0, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1))
  nfral(s0, hs2, cv(hs1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2))))))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nfeq2(s0, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))))
  nfov(s0, cv(hs2), c2, cres(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2))))
  nfres(s0, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfpred(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs2))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)

blocks.name: frrlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for founded recursion. The final item we are interested in is the union of acceptable functions ` B ` . This lemma just changes bound variables for later use. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: frrlem5
blocks.content: Lemma for founded recursion. The values of two acceptable functions agree within their domains. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Apr-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c1, cres(c0, cpred(c2, c3, cv(s0)))))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c0, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(s0), c1, cres(c0, cpred(c2, c3, cv(s0))))
  diff.cres.s(s2, c0, cpred(c2, c3, cv(s0)))
  diff.cpred.s(s2, c2, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
